content: This is primarily attributed to higher gross margins of $8.8 million, offset by $1.3 million increase in interest expense as a result of additional debt, as well as rising interest rates, along with increased plasma center operating expenses of $1.1 million attributed to having eight plasma centers in operation compared to four centers this time last year, as well as increased general administrative expenses of $1.5 million, resulting in increased headcount, commercialization and marketing expenditures.
